title: Ticket #1119: libvirtd restarting causes vm-gahp to continue on even though the conn
description:
ps aux | grep kvm

<see instance running>

/etc/init.d/libvirtd restart

ps aux | grep kvm

<see instance gone>

condor-vm_gahp continues on it's merry way even though the instance is gone.
remarks:
2010-Jan-21 15:26:40 by tstclair:
It will now reconnect if restart was called and exit on error.

2010-Jan-25 10:37:13 by jfrey:
My only comment on the patch is that VirshType::Connect() has a return type of bool, but it never returns a value.

2010-Jan-25 10:44:11 by tstclair:
true, I can change to void

The clip from the original calls EXCEPT on failure conditions, which is probably the "correct?" way to handle.

I was debating removing and using a bool.

2010-Jan-25 11:04:48 by jfrey:
I think keeping the EXCEPT() is fine. If we want better error handling on connection failure, that sounds like a separate enhancement.

2010-Jan-25 11:17:43 by tstclair:
change will be made, push will be forthcoming.

Thanks for the review.
